useCase.name: Request editorial-planning recommendations
useCase.trigger: NSF Employee initiates a request for editorial-planning recommendations.

mainSequence.step: NSF Employee requests editorial-planning recommendations from Project Manager.
Project Manager commissions User Research Team to conduct user research for CMS/editorial planning insights.
User Research Team consults with CMS Team on CMS capabilities and best practices.
CMS Team provides CMS insights and constraints to User Research Team.
User Research Team relays CMS insights and user needs to Web Development Team.
Web Development Team proposes editorial-planning recommendations based on technical feasibility to User Research Team.
User Research Team delivers compiled recommendations to Project Manager.
Project Manager presents editorial-planning recommendations to NSF Employee.
